Templates

Actor Reference

These adjectives are specific to type=actor templates.Actors also use adjectives from general and physics types. 

CHANCE
ERROR
EYEOFFSET
EXPLODE
FIREOFFSET
FOV
HEALTH
JUMPSPEED
LIGHTINTENSITY
LIGHTOFFSET
MAXHEADPITCH
MAXHEALTH
MAXROTTHRUST
MAXTHRUST
MINHEADPITCH
TYPEFLAGS
WEAPON
WEAPON2

CHANCE Actor

Chance of saber blocking

Use: chance=flex

ERROR Actor

Amount of saber blocking errors

Use: error=flex

EYEOFFSET Actor

Offsets the view the eyes see

Use: eyeoffset=vector

EXPLODE Actor

Actor explode template

Use: explode=template name

FIREOFFSET Actor

Offset shot is fired from

Use: fireoffset=vector

FOV Actor

Field of view in degrees

Use: fov=flex

HEALTH Actor

Specifies starting health

Use: health=flex

JUMPSPEED Actor

Jumping speed

Use: jumpspeed=flex

LIGHTINTENSITY Actor

Headlight intensity

Use: lightintensity=flex

LIGHTOFFSET Actor

Offsets the headlight

Use: lghtintensity=flex

MAXHEADPITCH Actor

Maximum amount actors head will pitch up and down

Use: maxheadpitch=flex

MAXHEALTH Actor

Specifies maximum health

Use: maxhealth=flex

MAXROTTHRUST Actor

Actors maximum rotational thrust

Use: maxrotthrust=flex

MAXTHRUST Actor

Specifies max thrust for actor

Use: maxthrust=flex

MINHEADPITCH

Minimum amount that the actors head will pitch up and down

Use: minheadpitch=flex

TYPEFLAGS

Specifies the actor flags Actor Flags

Use: typeflags=int

WEAPON Actor

Specifies primary weapon template for actor

Use: weapon=template name

WEAPON2 Actor

Specifies secondary weapon template for actor

Use: weapon2=template name
